sqlMap.insert: insert into AUTH_user ( username, realname, passwd, status, mobileno, phone, email, photo, up_uid, up_uname, identity, remark ) values ( #userName#, #realName#, #passWd#, #status#, #mobileNo#, #phone#, #email#, #photo#, #upUid#, #upUname#, #identity#, #remark# )
sqlMap.select: select t.id, t.username, t.realname, t.passwd, t.status, t.mobileno, t.phone, t.email, photo, up_uid, up_uname, identity, remark from AUTH_user t where t.username = #userName# and t.passwd = #userPwd#
